question:
Which among the following was/ were the reasons for sending Cripps mission to India?
  1. To demand full cooperation from India during the World war II
  2. To discuss about the proposal of Indian Constitution
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: British Prime Minister Winston Churchill send Cripps mission to India in the year 1942 to demand full cooperation from India during World war II and to discuss the proposal of the Indian Constitution. Cripps Mission reached Delhi on 23rd March.
